name: Minimal Jezz
description:
Minimal Jezz offers a new experience on this classic arcade game.

The aim of Minimal Jezz is to cover a portion of the area by drawing walls, without touching the balls.
 
As the name says it, the game is based on a minimalist design. The game is very simple and focuses on the gameplay. On the game screen, no score and no life-counts are displayed.

For each level, you have 3 lives.

The game features 25 colorful levels. For each level the number of balls ranges from 1 to 5.
